text: tum mein se jo buzrugi aur kushaadgi waale hai, unhe apne qaraabat-daaro aur miskino aur muhaajiro ko, fi-sabilillah dene se qasam na kha leni chahiye, balke maaf kar dena aur dar guzar kar lena chahiye, kya tum nahi chaahte ke Allah taâ€™ala tumhaare qusoor maaf farma de? Allah qusuro ko maaf farmaane waala meherbana hai
